tool_description: You Can Translate English to Any Languages within one minutes
name: Translator English to Any Languages
title: Translator English to Any Languages

api_list.name: Translate  English to ANY Languages
api_list.description: use POST Method to Translate **to** {language code here} **content **{user content here}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translator-english-to-any-languages.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translator-english-to-any-languages.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://translator-english-to-any-languages.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translator-english-to-any-languages.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
